00039 class DefaultSettings : public DMainWindowAbstractSettings
00040 {

00043   ~DefaultSettings();

00046   void restore(DMainWindow *w);
00047 };

00049 DefaultSettings::DefaultSettings(QObject *parent) : DMainWindowAbstractSettings(parent)
00050 {
00051 }

00053 DefaultSettings::~DefaultSettings()
00054 {
00055 }
00056 
00057 void DefaultSettings::save(DMainWindow *w)
00058 {
00059  QSettings settings(qApp->applicationName(), "ideality", this);
00060 //  settings.clear();
00061  
00062  QHash<Qt::ToolBarArea, DButtonBar *> buttonBars = w->buttonBars();
00063  QHash<DButtonBar *, QList<DToolView*> > toolViews = w->toolViews();
00064  
00065  foreach( DButtonBar *bar, buttonBars.values())
00066  {
00067   settings.beginGroup(bar->windowTitle());
00068   settings.setValue("exclusive", bar->isExclusive() );
00069   settings.endGroup();
00070   
00071   settings.beginGroup(bar->windowTitle());
00072   settings.setValue("autohide", bar->autohide() );
00073   settings.endGroup();
00074   
00075   foreach(DToolView *view, toolViews[bar] )
00076   {
00077    settings.beginGroup(view->objectName());
00078    
00079 //    qDebug() << view->windowTitle() << view->button()->area();
00080    
00081    settings.setValue("area", int( view->button()->area() ));
00082  
00083    settings.setValue("size", view->fixedSize());
00084    settings.setValue("style", view->button()->toolButtonStyle() );
00085    settings.setValue("sensibility", view->button()->isSensible());
00086  
00087    settings.setValue("visible", view->isVisible() );
00088    settings.setValue("floating", view->isFloating());
00089    settings.setValue("position", view->pos());
00090    
00091    settings.endGroup();
00092   }
00093  }
00094  
00095  settings.beginGroup( "MainWindow" );
00096  settings.setValue("size", w->size());
00097  settings.setValue("maximized", w->isMaximized() );
00098  settings.setValue("position", w->pos());
00099  
00100  settings.endGroup();
00101 }
00102 
00103 void DefaultSettings::restore(DMainWindow *w)
00104 {
00105  QSettings settings(qApp->applicationName(), "ideality", this);
00106  
00107  QHash<Qt::ToolBarArea, DButtonBar *> buttonBars = w->buttonBars();
00108  QHash<DButtonBar *, QList<DToolView*> > toolViews = w->toolViews();
00109  
00110  QList<DToolView *> toHide;
00111  
00112  foreach( DButtonBar *bar, buttonBars.values())
00113  {
00114   bar->setExclusive(false);
00115   
00116   foreach(DToolView *view, toolViews[bar] )
00117   {
00118    settings.beginGroup(view->objectName());
00119    
00120    // Restore position
00121    
00122    Qt::DockWidgetArea area = Qt::DockWidgetArea(settings.value("area", 0).toInt());
00123    
00124    w->moveToolView(view, area);
00125    
00126    view->setFixedSize(settings.value("size").toInt());
00127    
00128    view->button()->setToolButtonStyle( Qt::ToolButtonStyle(settings.value("style", int(view->button()->toolButtonStyle()) ).toInt()) );
00129    view->button()->setSensible( settings.value("sensibility", view->button()->isSensible()).toBool() );
00130    
00131    
00132    bool visible = settings.value("visible", false ).toBool();
00133    
00134    if ( visible && view->button()->isVisible() )
00135    {
00136     view->button()->setChecked(true);
00137     view->show();
00138    }
00139    else
00140    {
00141     toHide << view;
00142    }
00143    
00144    view->setFloating(settings.value("floating", false).toBool() );
00145    if ( view->isFloating() )
00146    {
00147     view->move(settings.value("position").toPoint());
00148    }
00149    
00150    settings.endGroup();
00151   }
00152   
00153   settings.beginGroup(bar->windowTitle());
00154   bar->setExclusive(settings.value("exclusive", true ).toBool());
00155   settings.endGroup();
00156   
00157 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040200
00158   settings.beginGroup(bar->windowTitle());
00159   bar->setAutoHide(settings.value("autohide", false ).toBool());
00160   settings.endGroup();
00161 #endif
00162  }
00163  
00164  foreach(DToolView *v, toHide )
00165  {
00166   v->button()->setChecked(false);
00167   v->setVisible(false);
00168   v->close();
00169  }
00170  
00171  settings.beginGroup( "MainWindow" );
00172  w->resize(settings.value("size").toSize());
00173  bool maximized = settings.value("maximized", false ).toBool();
00174  if ( maximized )
00175  {
00176   w->showMaximized();
00177  }
00178  
00179  w->move(settings.value("position").toPoint());
00180  
00181  settings.endGroup();
00182 }

00192 DMainWindow::DMainWindow(QWidget *parent)
00193  : QMainWindow(parent), m_forRelayout(0), m_currentPerspective(DefaultPerspective), m_autoRestore(false)
00194 {
00195  setObjectName("DMainWindow");
00196  
00197  m_settings = new DefaultSettings(this);
00198  
00199  addButtonBar(Qt::LeftToolBarArea);
00200  addButtonBar(Qt::RightToolBarArea);
00201  addButtonBar(Qt::TopToolBarArea);
00202  addButtonBar(Qt::BottomToolBarArea);
00203  
00204 #if 0
00205  setCorner(Qt::BottomLeftCorner, Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea);
00206  setCorner(Qt::TopLeftCorner, Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea);
00207  
00208  setCorner(Qt::BottomRightCorner, Qt::RightDockWidgetArea);
00209  setCorner(Qt::TopRightCorner, Qt::RightDockWidgetArea);
00210 #endif
00211 
00212 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040200
00213  setDockNestingEnabled (false);
00214 #endif
00215 }

00227 void DMainWindow::addButtonBar(Qt::ToolBarArea area)
00228 {
00229  DButtonBar *bar = new DButtonBar(area, this);
00230  
00231  addToolBar(area, bar);
00232  m_buttonBars.insert(area, bar);
00233  
00234  bar->hide();
00235 }

00237 
00246 DToolView *DMainWindow::addToolView(QWidget *widget, Qt::DockWidgetArea area, int perspective)
00247 {
00248  DToolView *toolView = new DToolView(widget->windowTitle(), widget->windowIcon());
00249  toolView->setWidget(widget);
00250  toolView->setPerspective( perspective );
00251  
00252  toolView->button()->setArea( toToolBarArea( area ) );
00253  m_buttonBars[toToolBarArea( area) ]->addButton(toolView->button());
00254  
00255  addDockWidget(area, toolView);
00256  widget->show();
00257  
00258  m_toolViews[m_buttonBars[toToolBarArea( area ) ]] << toolView;
00259  
00260  
00261  // Show separators
00262  if ( area == Qt::TopDockWidgetArea || area == Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea )
00263  {
00264   m_buttonBars[toToolBarArea( area ) ]->showSeparator(! m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea]->isEmpty());
00265  }
00266  else if ( area == Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea )
00267  {
00268   m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea]->showSeparator( m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea]->isEmpty() );
00269  }
00271  
00272  connect(toolView, SIGNAL(topLevelChanged(bool)), this, SLOT(relayoutViewButton(bool)));
00273  
00274  if ( toolView->isVisible() )
00275  {
00276   toolView->button()->click(); // Hide!
00277  }
00278  
00279  return toolView;
00280 }
00281 
00287 void DMainWindow::moveToolView(DToolView *view, Qt::DockWidgetArea newPlace)
00288 {
00289  if ( toDockWidgetArea(view->button()->area()) == newPlace || newPlace == Qt::AllDockWidgetAreas || newPlace == 0 )
00290  {
00291   return;
00292  }
00293  
00294  addDockWidget(newPlace, view);
00295  
00296  m_forRelayout = view;
00297  
00298  relayoutToolView();
00299 }
00300 
00306 void DMainWindow::addToPerspective(QWidget *widget, int perspective)
00307 {
00308  if ( QToolBar *bar = dynamic_cast<QToolBar*>(widget) )
00309  {
00310   if ( toolBarArea(bar) == 0 )
00311   {
00312    addToolBar( bar );
00313   }
00314  }
00315  
00316  if ( ! m_managedWidgets.contains( widget ) )
00317  {
00318   m_managedWidgets.insert( widget, perspective );
00319   
00320   if ( perspective != m_currentPerspective )
00321   {
00322    widget->hide();
00323   }
00324  }
00325 }
00326 
00331 void DMainWindow::removeFromPerspective(QWidget *widget)
00332 {
00333  m_managedWidgets.remove(widget);
00334 }
00335 
00341 void DMainWindow::addToPerspective(const QList<QAction *> &actions, int perspective)
00342 {
00343  foreach(QAction *a, actions)
00344  {
00345   addToPerspective(a, perspective);
00346  }
00347 }
00348 
00354 void DMainWindow::addToPerspective(QAction *action, int perspective)
00355 {
00356  if ( ! m_managedActions.contains( action ) )
00357  {
00358   m_managedActions.insert( action, perspective );
00359   
00360   if ( perspective != m_currentPerspective )
00361   {
00362    action->setVisible(false);
00363   }
00364  }
00365 }
00366 
00371 void DMainWindow::removeFromPerspective(QAction *action)
00372 {
00373  m_managedActions.remove(action);
00374 }

00376 Qt::DockWidgetArea DMainWindow::toDockWidgetArea(Qt::ToolBarArea area)
00377 {
00378  switch(area)
00379  {
00380   case Qt::LeftToolBarArea:
00381   {
00382    return Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea;
00383   }
00384   break;
00385   case Qt::RightToolBarArea:
00386   {
00387    return Qt::RightDockWidgetArea;
00388   }
00389   break;
00390   case Qt::TopToolBarArea:
00391   {
00392    return Qt::TopDockWidgetArea;
00393   }
00394   break;
00395   case Qt::BottomToolBarArea:
00396   {
00397    return Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea;
00398   }
00399   break;
00400   default: qWarning("toDockWidgetArea: Floating... %d", area); break;
00401  }
00402  
00403  return Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea;
00404 }
00405 
00406 Qt::ToolBarArea DMainWindow::toToolBarArea(Qt::DockWidgetArea area)
00407 {
00408  switch(area)
00409  {
00410   case Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea:
00411   {
00412    return Qt::LeftToolBarArea;
00413   }
00414   break;
00415   case Qt::RightDockWidgetArea:
00416   {
00417    return Qt::RightToolBarArea;
00418   }
00419   break;
00420   case Qt::TopDockWidgetArea:
00421   {
00422    return Qt::TopToolBarArea;
00423   }
00424   break;
00425   case Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea:
00426   {
00427    return Qt::BottomToolBarArea;
00428   }
00429   break;
00430   default: qWarning("toToolBarArea: Floating... %d", area); break;
00431  }
00432  
00433  return Qt::LeftToolBarArea;
00434 }

00445   bar->setEnableButtonBlending(enable);

00448 
00449 void DMainWindow::relayoutViewButton(bool topLevel)
00450 {
00451  if ( !topLevel )
00452  {
00453   if ( DToolView *toolView = dynamic_cast<DToolView *>(sender()) )
00454   {
00455    m_forRelayout = toolView;
00456    
00457    QTimer::singleShot( 0, this, SLOT(relayoutToolView()));
00458 //    relayoutToolView();
00459    
00460    // if a tool view is floating the button bar isn't exclusive
00461    DButtonBar *bar = m_buttonBars[m_forRelayout->button()->area()];
00462    
00463    qDebug() << (m_forRelayout->button()->area());
00464    bool exclusive = true;
00465    
00466    foreach(DToolView *v, m_toolViews[bar] )
00467    {
00468     exclusive = exclusive && !v->isFloating();
00469    }
00470    
00471    bar->setExclusive( exclusive );
00472    
00473    bar->onlyShow( m_forRelayout, true );
00474   }
00475  }
00476  else
00477  {
00478   // Floating tool views aren't exclusive
00479   if ( DToolView *toolView = dynamic_cast<DToolView *>(sender()) )
00480   {
00481    m_buttonBars[toolView->button()->area()]->setExclusive(false);
00482   }
00483  }
00484  
00485 }
00486 
00487 void DMainWindow::relayoutToolView()
00488 {
00489  if ( !m_forRelayout ) return;
00490  
00491  bool isVisible = m_forRelayout->isVisible();
00492  
00493  if ( !isVisible ) m_forRelayout->show();
00494  
00495  DViewButton *button = m_forRelayout->button();
00496  
00497  Qt::ToolBarArea area = toToolBarArea( QMainWindow::dockWidgetArea(m_forRelayout) );
00498  
00499  if ( !isVisible ) m_forRelayout->close();
00500  
00501 //  qDebug() << "Relayout: " << m_forRelayout->windowTitle() << " from " << button->area() << " to " << area;
00502  
00503  if ( area != button->area() && !m_forRelayout->isFloating() )
00504  {
00505   setUpdatesEnabled( false );
00506   
00507   m_buttonBars[button->area()]->removeButton(button);
00508   // Show separators
00509   if ( button->area() == Qt::LeftToolBarArea )
00510   {
00511    m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea]->showSeparator(! m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea]->isEmpty());
00512    
00513    m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea]->showSeparator(! m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea]->isEmpty());
00514   }
00515   else if ( area == Qt::LeftToolBarArea )
00516   {
00517    m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea]->showSeparator(m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea]->isEmpty());
00518    
00519    m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea]->showSeparator(m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea]->isEmpty());
00520   }
00522   
00523   m_toolViews[m_buttonBars[button->area()]].removeAll(m_forRelayout);
00524   m_toolViews[m_buttonBars[area]] << m_forRelayout;
00525   button->setArea(area);
00526   m_buttonBars[area]->addButton(button);
00527   
00528   m_buttonBars[area]->repaint();
00529   setUpdatesEnabled( true );
00530  }
00531  
00532 //  qDebug() << m_forRelayout->windowTitle() << m_forRelayout->button()->isChecked();
00533  
00534  m_forRelayout = 0;
00535 }
00536 
00541 void DMainWindow::setCurrentPerspective(int wsp)
00542 {
00543  if ( m_currentPerspective == wsp ) return;
00544  
00545  typedef QList<DToolView *> Views;
00546  
00547  QList<Views > viewsList = m_toolViews.values();
00548  
00549  setUpdatesEnabled( false );
00550  centralWidget()->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
00551  
00552  QHash<DButtonBar *, int> hideButtonCount;
00553  
00554  foreach(Views views, viewsList)
00555  {
00556   foreach(DToolView *v, views )
00557   {
00558    DButtonBar *bar = m_buttonBars[ v->button()->area() ];
00559    
00560    bar->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
00561    v->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
00562    
00563    if ( v->perspective() & wsp )
00564    {
00565     bar->enable( v->button() );
00566     
00567     if ( v->button()->isChecked() )
00568     {
00569      v->show();
00570     }
00571    }
00572    else
00573    {
00574     bar->disable( v->button() );
00575     
00576     if ( v->button()->isChecked() || v->isVisible() )
00577     {
00578      v->close();
00579     }
00580     
00581     hideButtonCount[bar]++;
00582    }
00583    
00584    if ( bar->isEmpty() )
00585    {
00586     bar->hide();
00587    }
00588    else if ( ! bar->isVisible() )
00589    {
00590     bar->show();
00591    }
00592    
00593    v->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
00594    bar->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
00595   }
00596  }
00597  
00598  QHashIterator<DButtonBar *, int> barIt(hideButtonCount);
00599  
00600  while ( barIt.hasNext() )
00601  {
00602   barIt.next();
00603   
00604   if ( barIt.key()->count() == barIt.value() )
00605   {
00606    barIt.key()->hide();
00607   }
00608  }
00609  
00610  QHashIterator<QWidget *, int> widgetIt(m_managedWidgets);
00611  
00612  while ( widgetIt.hasNext() )
00613  {
00614   widgetIt.next();
00615   
00616   if ( widgetIt.value() & wsp )
00617   {
00618    widgetIt.key()->show();
00619   }
00620   else
00621   {
00622    widgetIt.key()->hide();
00623   }
00624  }
00625  
00626  QHashIterator<QAction *, int> actionIt(m_managedActions);
00627  
00628  while ( actionIt.hasNext() )
00629  {
00630   actionIt.next();
00631   
00632   if ( actionIt.value() & wsp )
00633   {
00634    actionIt.key()->setVisible(true);
00635   }
00636   else
00637   {
00638    actionIt.key()->setVisible(false);
00639   }
00640  }
00641  
00642  centralWidget()->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
00643  setUpdatesEnabled( true );
00644  
00645  
00646  m_currentPerspective = wsp;
00647  
00648  emit perspectiveChanged( m_currentPerspective );
00649 }
00650 
00655 int DMainWindow::currentPerspective() const
00656 {
00657  return m_currentPerspective;

00686 void DMainWindow::setSettingsHandler(DMainWindowAbstractSettings *settings)
00687 {
00688  delete m_settings;
00689  
00690  m_settings = settings;
00691  m_settings->setParent(this);
00692 }
00693 
00694 void DMainWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *e)
00695 {
00696  saveGUI();
00697  
00698  QMainWindow::closeEvent(e);
00699 }
00700 
00701 void DMainWindow::showEvent(QShowEvent *e)
00702 {
00703  QMainWindow::showEvent(e);
00704  
00705  if ( !m_autoRestore )
00706  {
00707   m_autoRestore = true;
00708   restoreGUI();
00709   
00710   int cwsp = m_currentPerspective;
00711   
00712   m_currentPerspective -= 1;
00713   setCurrentPerspective( cwsp );
00714  }
00715 }
00716 
00717 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040200
00718 bool DMainWindow::event(QEvent *e)
00719 {
00720  if ( e->type() == QEvent::HoverMove )
00721  {
00722   // Show bar if autohide is enabled
00723   QPoint pos = mapFromGlobal(QCursor::pos());
00724   
00725   DButtonBar *bar = 0;
00726   
00727   if ( pos.x() <= m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea]->pos().x() + 3  ) // Left
00728   {
00729    bar = m_buttonBars[Qt::LeftToolBarArea];
00730    
00731   }
00732   else if ( pos.y() <= m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea]->pos().y() + 3 && m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea]->pos().y() <= pos.y())
00733   {
00734    bar = m_buttonBars[Qt::TopToolBarArea];
00735   }
00736   else if ( pos.x() >= m_buttonBars[Qt::RightToolBarArea]->pos().x() + m_buttonBars[Qt::RightToolBarArea]->width() - 3 )
00737   {
00738    bar = m_buttonBars[Qt::RightToolBarArea];
00739   }
00740   else if ( pos.y() >= m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea]->pos().y() +  m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea]->height() - 3 && m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea]->pos().y()+m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea]->height() > pos.y()  )
00741   {
00742    bar = m_buttonBars[Qt::BottomToolBarArea];
00743   }
00744   
00745   if ( bar )
00746   {
00747    if ( bar->autohide() && !bar->isVisible() && !bar->isEmpty() )
00748    {
00749     bar->show();
00750    }
00751   }
00752  }
00753  
00754  return QMainWindow::event(e);
00755 }
00756 
00757 #endif

00759 void DMainWindow::saveGUI()
00760 {
00761  m_settings->save( this );
00762 }
00763 
00764 void DMainWindow::restoreGUI()
00765 {
00766  setUpdatesEnabled(false);
00767  m_settings->restore(this);
00768  setUpdatesEnabled(true);
00769 }
